Hi!

what do you recommend using to play such file??
try a program called VLC PLAYER. worked for me, had no audio till i went in audio settings and changed to audio channel 2, hope this is of help
By the way, thanks for upload HDTV CHINA, will seed 100% back. good picture shame about black bars at 1920 x 1080 resolution.
